testcase.name: Register with mandatory fields
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Register Account page...............................undefined When User enters first name "Ravikanth" Into the First Name field...........skipped And Enters lastname "Lella" into the Last Name field........................skipped And Enters email address "ravikanthlella@gmail.com" into the Email field....skipped And Enters telephone "1234567890" into the Telephone field..................skipped And Enters password "12345" into the Password field.........................skipped And Enters password "12345" into the Password Confirm field.................skipped And Selects Privacy Policy field............................................skipped And Click on Continue button................................................skipped Then Account should get successfully created................................skipped

testcase.name: Register with all fields
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Register Account page...............................undefined When User enters first name "Ravikanth" Into the First Name field...........skipped And Enters lastname "Lella" into the Last Name field........................skipped And Enters email address "ravikanthlella@gmail.com" into the Email field....skipped And Enters telephone "1234567890" into the Telephone field..................skipped And Enters password "12345" into the Password field.........................skipped And Enters password "12345" into the Password Confirm field.................skipped And Selects Yes for Newsletter..............................................skipped And Selects Privacy Policy field............................................skipped And Click on Continue button................................................skipped Then Account should get successfully created................................skipped

testcase.name: Register without providing any fields.
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Register Account page...............................undefined When User donot enter details into any fields...............................skipped And Click on Continue button................................................skipped Then Warning messages should be displayed for all the mandatory fields......skipped
